Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Really great southern restaurant. To be honest, when we drove up to what appeared to be a neighborhood restaurant, I was skeptical. Super creative menu and tasty drinks. Definitely would recommend!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Amazing!!! This place is such a hidden but non hidden jewel. I enjoyed every minute of our dinner here on a Friday night. We didn't have a reservation but we were greeted with a smile and seated right away. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Get the Mac n cheese!!! Short rib Benedict was good... slightly mushy waffle with all the sauce on it and the waffles with chicken sandwich was surprisingly a little bland and not cheesy at all. Got a side of the Mac which mDe me regret not getting the entree. Would definitely go back.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I have eaten at Cuckoo‚Äôs Nest many times and it never disappoints.  Absolutely delicious brunch and dinner, every time.  You cannot get a bad meal here - every menu option is delicious. I have had the fried green tomatoes, deviled eggs, ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Family and I came here while driving to Vermont. Awesome place to have brunch and the food here was amazing. We had no issues from the beginning till the end. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: very good food. enjoyed every bite. deviled eggs and grits like I've never had before. packed house. make reservations. typical Albany parking so get there early.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: This place is absolutely amazing ! Chicken and waffles were delicious! My husband got the short rib hash and it was also amazing . We will definitely be back !

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: We visited this place earlier this year. Absolutely delicious! The fried green tomatoes are the best I have ever tasted! The Mac and cheese was also to die for! The staff were friendly and we definitely will be back to try more things!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The Cuckoo's Nest has a lot of great reviews and I can see why: their food is tasty, the restaurant has a nice atmosphere, and the staff is pleasant. All the makings for a great dining experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: 1st time in with a friend that has been there many times.  It was delicious.  Glad we made a reservation.  Next time I will try the ü¶û eggs ü•öBenedict.  My friend ordered that and I had the cream cheese/blueberry French toast.  Mine was delicious; his had my mouth watering.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: A true home style southern cooking with loving hospitality. Rapid seating and service with a smile. The biscuits were so moist and light, it's make from scratch every day. The grilled Salmon with asparagus was cooked to temperature and ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: It was okay, the food looked better than it tasted. The service was okay, the wait was a little long (over 30 min) and the chicken in the waffle sandwich could‚Äôve used more seasoning and it was a little dry. Everything was just okay, nothing really stood out.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Really good food. Kitchen really pays attention to details. Nice array of menu items to choose from. Staff very friendly. Good mix for the brunch mimosas. Good value for price.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great southern food! Highly recommend the half fried chicken (light and crispy), the biscuits with honey butter and the cornbread. Staff is friendly and attentive and the atmosphere is relaxed. Can't wait to go back again!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Brunch crab cake bennies and fried green tomatoes. Gets busy so reservations are a good idea or just eat at the bar.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: We held our rehearsal dinner for our wedding here, and had a wonderful experience. Planning was super easy, they have lots of good options and are very responsive. Prices were reasonable, and a mimosa bar will get my business every time. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The food is delicious! The atmosphere is warm and cozy. Cheesecake was out of this world. Service was incredible! Darby and Celia took such good care of us. We will definitely be back!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The food just wasn‚Äôt good. I ordered the chicken dinner my food was not hot. I had to send my biscuits back because they where cold. The crab dip was good, but I tasted no crab what so ever. I wasn‚Äôt happy with my experience, I had high hopes but the mark was missed.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Another excellent meal at Cukoo's Nest. We love coming here. Both the food and cocktail menu offer a fresh and unique spin on southern classics, served along a delicately decorative atomposohere. The fried chicken is always a delight, especially with the hot honey sauce and the biscuits are unmatched.  Highly recommend.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I was in yesterday for brunch with my friend and her daughter for brunch. It was fantastic. The Bloody Mary's were excellent, the food was incredible and the waitstaff was professional and efficient. We all shared food, the chicken and ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I follow Cuckoo's Nest on IG and I've been drooling over the lobster roll photos so I decided to treat myself and place a to go order!! I placed the order in the morning and provided a pick up time. I was told that they would bring the food ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Such great food and an amazing staff.  My family and I have been going here for a little over a year and the food is consistently delicious.  We met the head chef and owner today, who were super welcoming and friendly.  The staff is super. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: We have been going to cuckoo‚Äòa nest for about 4 years now. This indoor playground is clean, beautiful, perfect size, with all necessary play structures. My 5 and 4 year old boys love going there. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:
A diamond in the rough. The ambiance was turn of the century country kitchen? The staff was wonderful, specifically one girl who noticed we had a developmentally challenged child with us and helped to make us feel comfortable. Thank You!
We had brunch which was about 20 bucks per plate. The food was very tasty!!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: 1st time visiting this Wonderful Place. We did not have a reservation for Sunday Brunch but were happy to take two bar seats. We own a local cafe and are always looking for a quality breakfast on a Sunday (cooked by others). This place DID ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Clean neighborhood restaurant with a European flair. Excellent and helpful helpful wait staff. The food was presented beautifully.  Very original, tasty and creative dishes. Hats off to the chef for his creations. Prices were average and ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great restaurant with the best fried chicken I have ever had.  The chcicken was perfectly seasoned and juicy.  The mashed potatoes were rich and well made.  One of my companions had blackened catfish served over creamed corn that was wonderful.  Our waitperson took the time to find out how the chicken was made.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Small and eclectic atmosphere... Super cute!! Food and drink was absolutely delicious!! Wish I had taken a pic of the grit tots because the presentation was pretty and they were so tasty!!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I got the Waffle Sandwich, hubs got chicken and waffles and friend got breakfast biscuits. The chicken was juicy, Honey hot sauce was great, Mac and cheese was creamy and waffles were perfect. Highly recommended!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Absolutely delicious! Thank you Emy for your wonderful service! Great spot!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Probably my favorite brunch place in Albany now. The fried chicken was moist and crunchy and he biscuits were incredible. Would recommend the Coop Deville as well. Only thing that didnt blow us away were he mimosas.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: This place is one of the safe heavens here in Albany. Quaint yet classy, lovely patio with a busy view. The light are incredible at night but hey; the food. I had a Salmon and it was perfect the sauce that accompany it was delicious too. The staff were very respectful and attentive, they make you feel welcome.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I had the Coop Devile, very good portion and pretty damn tasty. I will definitely be returning to try out their dinner options.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great fried chicken sandwich. Fun cocktails. A nice southern experience in an area without a lot of southern food.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: This place was recommended by a friend and what a great recommendation. The apps we got were out of this world. Sorry no picts of them we just dove in. We had fried green tomatoes, grit tots (a must), and biscuits with honey butter. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: They charged me $8 per bottle of water. WATER. I paid more for a bottle of water than should ever be acceptable. It‚Äôs some fake bougie place that charges $8 per water bottle that I bought at SHOP RITE for $3!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Wow, this place is crazy good. It's not health food, it's decadent. Service was great.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Delicious food and friendly staff.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Good food, ambience and service. It's a nice place where you could go out with your friends.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: So damn delicious!!! This place is a must for anyone living in Albany or just visiting. Make sure u call ahead to make reservations as it is very busy

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: This is one place that do chicken sandwiches RIGHT! crispy on the outside, moist inside... yum yum. Oh the fries are amazing as well. Don't let this gem slide.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Buttermilk Fried Chicken and Waffles were flavored to perfection, sauces were an exceptional complimentary to the dish. A must are the fried green tomatoes.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: We've been twice and really enjoyed our first experience (dinner) and somewhat enjoyed the second (brunch). The ambience is great and servers friendly. We appreciate that they still wear masks as well. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Good food and great service. I really liked their fried chicken Benedict. A good option for brunch maybe.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Awesome in every respect.  Great ambiance, terrific food and the staff is top notch!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The service was amazing! Very welcoming! Really liked the food! I ordered what I knew, but tried a lot of the different items, thanks to the ladies I dined with! That apple cider mimosa... Goodness gracious!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Best chicken and waffles in the northeast hands down!!!!   And the waitress was awesome.  Great ppl.  I will definitely be back.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: This has become one of my favorite spots after just two visits. I went for dinner the first time and fell in love with the grit tots and biscuits with honey butter. Amazing start to my meal and the shrimp and grits entree was also ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Had breakfast here twice now, both times have been phenomenal. Chicken and waffle is just perfection.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: One of the most pleasant restaurant experiences I've ever had. Atmosphere, food, service, everything was amazing. Had the fried green tomatoes, BBQ wings, and Mac&chz. All was top notch (especially the FGT's).

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Dimond in the rough, great little place in Albany. Wish were were there for the main menu, we gor the limited happ hour. Try the cheese dip and the wings both were perfect. Drinks were great too.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I really enjoyed the chicken here! I ordered the Chicken and Waffles. You get a nice big waffle and tons of fried chicken along with Maple Bourbon sauce for the waffles and hot sauce for the chicken. I'd definitely recommend giving this ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Small place near college town with trendy atmosphere and modern American cuisine. First time going but overall was good. Food was tasty, had the grit tots, Nashville hot chicken sandwich (not as spicy as expected) and seafood gnocchi. Was a ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:
Go for a good brunch experience. Great food and soothing ambience.
Must try‚Äî Short rib hash and biscuits.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Such a good time! My daughters bday. Special time.. We loved it. Great service, food very good.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I wish I could give this place ten stars. We loved the Gingerman and were hesitant to try its replacement but oh so glad we did. The food and waitstaff was top notch. We stopped for an appetizer and stayed for dinner. Everything we had was ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: We had take out and everything was AMAZING! Fried green tomatoes, crab cake, seafood gnocchi and shrimp and grits. Everything was delicious and so flavorful. Staff was very pleasant to order from and during pick up. Looking forward to eating from here again and in person soon!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I know it‚Äôs a faux pas to photograph your food, but this is to say: if you all get a chance, definitely visit Cuckoo‚Äôs Nest in Albany. It‚Äôs pricey but the food is even better than my pictures convey. Don‚Äôt believe me? Go google the menu...

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Real, down home, soul food. From the collard greens, fried green tomatoes, shrimp and grits, honey butter and biscuits, to the fried chicken and waffles. Every item is bursting with flavor, but from natural ingredients. Nicely priced, super flavorful, GREAT service, and beautifully presented equals I'll be back :)

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Extremely friendly & professional team of hostesses. Our server was  very efficient.  The food is phenomenal!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:
Food was very good.  Fried chicken was some of the best I've had anywhere.
The fried green tomatoes were also very good.
Portions are fairly large, come hungry.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I can‚Äôt believe I‚Äôve never tried this place before. I used to live right down the street and missed this gem. Went to enjoy brunch with my girls and the place was clean and inviting. Our server was friendly and accommodating for all 5 of ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great food and service outstanding.  Jen was very attractive and personable.  Will visit again next time we visit from Corning.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Amazing food. The interior is amazing ,the atmosphere is just wonderful. The lamb ravioli special was superb. First time I had lamb that was amazing. The short rib was so tender and soft. I ate half of a giant portion and was satisfied. Can't wait to go again!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Always a wonderful experience from the moment you enter the door with the warmest greeting. The hostess takes your coat, pulls your chair and is quite delightful. The drinks are perfectly mixed with a wide array of specialty choices for ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Went for brunch for the first time. Food was delicious, lovely hip atmosphere, and very friendly service. Average plate prices are around $16-$18. The fried chicken is great!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Has to be the best fried chicken sandwich I‚Äôve ever had. So much flavor and crisp.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Excellent food with a southern flair

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: This rating is for their pricing. The food was delicious, but this restaurant is in Albany New York, not New York City so there is no reason they should be charging$27 for a pork entree... Also who still charges a plate splitting fee?

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:

Review Text: Great meal. Everything was perfect. This place is waaay too far north for such a delicious Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwich. üòã

Review Text: Overall experience was great! Juicy fried chicken..yum!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Fantastic brunch.  Parking lot in back.  You may get there and think "Really?  Parking lot in back?" Yes, parking lot in back.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:
I was shocked. Me and my girlfriend found this gem. So suprised

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great brunch spot. Nice atmosphere and amazing brunch entrees and drinks.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:
Delightful restaurant! Had dinner there with my daughter and we both loved it! Greeted at the door by a very friendly and professional server.
Food was delicious! Great selection of drinks. Both of us are going back next week! Highly recommended!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Clean, nice atmosphere, friendly staff, food was very tasty, drinks were made well, a little on the expensive side.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Amazing Southern food! Best biscuits we‚Äôve ever had!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Review Text: Pretty much a Cuckoo's Nest groupie at this point. We used to go to the Ginger Man every year or two and the food was good but never seemed to change. Cuckoo's Nest we went to once or twice pre-pandemic but eat it almost every week since ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great atmosphere, great food, great service, great background music, and great drinks. I will return if ever in the Albany area again.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic,  food was very much on point!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Just had the family style roast chicken meal and could not be more impressed. The ordering process was so easy. The food was outstanding. I don't know what part was my favorite because it was all so amazing. You can tell how much effort ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The food was wonderful. The staff was professional and efficient and the owners are the absolute best!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Food was really good. Service was nice but a little on the slow side. Didn't seem very busy either. Had the fried chicken and waffles. Very good on both. Portions were big. Price was solid for what I had. Will definitely go again.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The food was excellent and the service was superb! I have the waffle and chicken, the chicken had the perfect amount of crunch, the skin was golden, perfectly seasoned and juicy. As an appetizer, I had the fried grits, first time trying ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Totally disappointed, the reviews here made the place seem great, the only thing that was worthwhile were the collard greens.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Everything was great from the Service to the Food. Great place! Definitely going back

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Excellent food and service !! Cant wait for the Schenectady location to open!!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Food is absolutely delicious, got the grits tots, the biscuits, and a half chicken; it was all superbly cooked and some of the best I've ever had. They have private parking around back which is great for the area. Very close to The Egg and downtown Albany if you're looking for a great meal before a show.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Review Text: Visiting from out of town, I came across Cuckoo's Nest in my search for good, non- chain restaurant food in Albany.   Well, I'm glad I did!  I had carry-out so not a lot to rate but I'm certainly encouraged by my choices.  Ordered two ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Wonderful service and really great food. My daughter loved her chicken sandwich. Kid approved.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I can‚Äôt believe I waited until today to try this establishment out. I had a wonderful brunch experience. The food, drinks and service was fantastic.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Excellent service, food was delicious, huge portions! Highly recommend!!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great Brunch spot in Albany. Getting better with time.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:
This place is assume and the food is great. A nice spin on the hot sauce. I had the shrimp and grits nice size shrimps and grits soft and the seasoning great. I'm from Charleston SC, so I know what good food taste like.
I could go on and on but you gotta go there and see for yourself.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The food and drinks here are really great. My only issue is that they require you to give a card in order to even make a reservation. Personally I think that‚Äôs just ridiculous. Will still be coming every so often to enjoy their food but that policy did put a bad taste in my mouth.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Review Text: Have had brunch here twice, both times were excellent. After a night of partying, its hard to beat chicken n waffles with a mimosa. The biscuits are always warm out of the oven, and the gravy was pretty good. The chicken & waffles is a ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Really enjoyed our first visit here yesterday.  They had many great tales on some classics that I grew up with down south. For appetizers, I had the grit tots and they were amaze-balls.  Amy tried their fried green tomatoes ("a little ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Southern food at its finest.  Coca Cola braised short ribs were amazing, and my wife loved the Southerner chicken  sandwich.  Awesome atmosphere, good music, cool decor and great beer choices.  I will be back!!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: A cozy atmosphere hosts very good food and great cocktails. The crave chicken sandwich and grit tots are excellent. Our waiter Miles was very helpful in helping us choose what tot get. Will definitely eat here again next time we're in town.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: All of the food was fresh, creative, flavorful and delicious.  The cocktails we're excellent as well.  It has a rustic farmhouse vibe which compliments the southern themed menu.  The atmosphere was lively and energetic and the bar has a unique design with a decent amount of seating.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Very good! I love that they accept brunch reservations! Food and service is great!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:
Cute little restaurant, right by a popular, scenic park.
It's all street parking!
The Fried Green Tomato "sliders" appetizer is pretty awesome - all the toppings ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Amazing rib appetizer, southern chicken sandwich and topped off with homemade chocolate something pecan pie for dessert! Everything was a pleasure to taste and service was great. Will definitely be back again, even if just to grab another slice of pie.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Review Text: This spot serves a ton of southern brunch/food and drinks at great portions and prices! The restaurant was able to accommodate a reservation of 10 with great service and attention and that's a great expectation.

Review Text:
There are other options outside of Cafe Madison in Albany, this is a good one.

Review Text: Get the chicken sandwich and biscuits and gravy. This place is fantastic and the service is probably the best in Albany.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Went for brunch based on a suggestion. I ordered fried green tomatoes. They were excellent. Tasted some of the dishes my company ordered. They were all excellent as well. Definitely going there again.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest

Other than that the rest are good.  Stopped by in Albany on the way to VT. Tip: plenty of parking space right behind the restaurant.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Waffle came out cold, other than that food was decent

Review Text: Cute, southern-style neighborhood restaurant with an emphasis on fried chicken and fried green tomatoes. Southern-focused but extensive drink menu. This restaurant stays very much on theme for the decor and food. The staff is very friendly ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Fried green tomatoes are to die forrr! Catfish is cooked to perfection. Delicious and unique combinations with great presentation! A must try!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: What a great twist on Southern cuisine! Their pickled watermelon is a nice treat if you have never given that a try in a salad. Definitely a treat for your palate. Budget before by checking the menu!

Review Text: Had the pecan crusted salmon. The pecan crust was chewy, but salmon was cooked well.  However, it was listed on the menu as being served with sweet potato mash and brussel sprouts. The mash was more like a puree and there were just chewy ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great food,  service and atmosphere. If you're an old timer this restaraunt is located where the Gingerman used to be. Park in the back!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Cute small Resturant, amazing chicken sandwiches

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Food (fried chicken, mashed potato, salad, and biscuits) was excellent and take out experience was smooth and nice. When I dropped by the restaurant at early evening in Thursday, I see all tables at patio occupied by patrons. I hope to dine in after COVID-19 is put to end.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Called to see if we could come in for two said we could sit at the bar and that they would reserve if we came in within 10 minutes. Which we did and they sat someone else by the time we got there. Disorganized. Probably won‚Äôt ever try going ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Amazing grits tots with sausage gravy and hot sauce. The flavors worked well together, grit tots fried perfectly. The whole menu looked delicious. Great bar too. Will return to try more.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Amazing take on southern fare. The chicken was nice and crunchy, the sauce on the fried green tomatoes was nicely spiced and the Mac and cheese very creamy.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: We hosted our Wedding Rehearsal Brunch at the Cuckoo's Nest and were extremely delighted with the food and the service we received. The staff at the Cuckoo's Nest were so communicative and easy to work with. I would highly recommend the Cuckoo's Nest to anyone.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: We were in Albany visiting from Toronto and discovered this gem. We enjoyed the creativity and authenticity of the food so much that we ended by eating dinner 2 nights in a row followed by brunch on the last day of our 3 day trip! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Excellent service with even better food! Always bet on good fried chicken

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Amazing grits tots with sausage gravy and hot sauce. The flavors worked well together, grit tots fried perfectly. The whole menu looked delicious. Great bar too. Will return to try more.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Fried chicken was great.  Hard to find good fried chicken that isn't overly fried and very dry.  Nice and moist inside

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The portion size was extremely small for the price. I was insulted with the teaspoon of grits I received with my shrimp.  On top of the fact that it wasn't that tasteful. It's southern food,  I expect more. The only 5 star I have about this place is the customer service. Other than that,  I don't think I will return.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Wonderful dining experience! Cozy restaurant with a tasty menu of foods rarely found this far north (and rarely as inventive). The cream cheese frosting on the carrot cake is absolutely perfect!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: First time eating here. Will be back soon!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text:
Ok at best the chicken was over cooked and dark. The cornbread was very good but counts as a side not I included. Mac & cheese was thick and rich.
Over all when I leave place thinking about the check and not the food I most likely never go back.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Very nice meal. Great  atmosphere. Wonderful service. Me and Keisha recommend.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Delicious and unusual beignets using heirloom tomatoes. Great service. Scrumptious jambalaya and cocktails. Quite a find in an Albany neighborhood. Wish I had a photo of the carefully appointed decor.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Very good.  The Gingerman was a favorite of mine so I was sad to see it go, but excited to see what would open in its place.  First off - I like the decor; they've kept very little of the 'literary pub' (?) look which made the Gingerman ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Amazing food. I was absolutely blown away. I only ordered the caesar salad, with a side of fried chicken and cornbread. I didn't realize that the crutons were also made out of cornbread. What an excellent touch! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Still delicious even with the challenges of COVID.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Awesome place. Decor needs some work but it is warm and inviting. Food and service were both quite excellent. Great food reasonable prices. Must try the smoked wings! Best I have had at a restaurant ever! Highly recommended

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: The food here is amazing, some of the best fried chicken I ever had. Great cocktails and great atmosphere. 10/10 would recommend

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: My husband & I decided to try this place today for lunch on a recommendation from a friend.  It was also our wedding anniversary, so we anticipating having a nice lunch. At first glance it hasn't changed much from the Gingerman.  The staff ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Great Staff, very nice lunch!!

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: If your feeling fired chicken this is the place to try. Went for lunch, everything was excellent. The sandwich and the soul bowl. Nice place, staff was great. Parking out back if your not from the area.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: If you want southern food, complete with the nap that comes after, go to the Cuckoo's Nest. Incredible biscuits in sausage gravy, I also got the chicken and waffles (unbeatable) and the Crave chicken sandwich. There isn't a place in Albany that does fried chicken better.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Wow!  Delicious, gourmet gastropub based on classic southern cusine.  Good microbrew selection, outdoor seating, friendly staff, easy to bike to in the city. What more could you ask for?

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: Delicious chicken sandwiches. Went for brunch on saturday, there was no line which is ideal and the food came quick. I had the standard chicken sandwich and couldnt have been happier.

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: We were heading to church and wanted some place close by. We hit a gem with the Cuckoo‚Äôs Nest. We called in our order 15 minutes out. It was ready when we arrived. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
Review Text: I think about the biscuits more than a normal person does...

Name: Cuckoo's Nest
